definitions: a person who attempts to cause rain to fall, either by rituals or by a scientific technique such as seeding clouds with crystals.
shortDefinitions: person who attempts to cause rain to fall, either by rituals or by scientific technique such as seeding clouds with crystals

definitions: a person who generates income for a business or organization by brokering deals or attracting clients or funds.
shortDefinitions: person who generates income for business or organization by brokering deals or attracting clients or funds
